original_text: I will still sing to thank the Lord! I will be happy because God is the one who makes me safe. 3: Habakkuk says this: Whatever happens he will still praise the Lord. He knows that God still has authority to rule! So he will still praise the Lord, even when bad things are happening. I will still sing to thank the Lord!
korean_text: 나는 여호와로 말미암아 즐거워하며 나의 구원의 하나님으로 말미암아 기뻐하리로다

sentences.original_text: I will still sing to thank the Lord!
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 여전히 주님께 감사하기 위해 노래할 것입니다!

sentences.original_text: because God is the one who makes me safe
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 하나님은 나를 안전하게 해주시는 분이시기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: he will still praise the Lord
He knows that God still has authority to rule
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님께서 여전히 통치할 권위를 가지고 계심을 압니다

sentences.original_text: So he will still praise the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 여전히 주님을 찬양할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: even when bad things are happening
I will still sing to thank the Lord!
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 여전히 주님께 감사하기 위해 노래할 것입니다!
